teaser: Electric car company Tesla has the best-performing auto stock in 2013 so far. Today the company is being bumped up to the NASDAQ-100 index. And new documents, leaked by Edward Snowden and reported in The Guardian newspaper, show how the NSA got Microsoft to circumvent its own encryption.
title: Marketplace Tech for Monday, July 15, 2013
description: Electric car company Tesla has the best-performing auto stock in 2013 so far. Today the company is being bumped up to the NASDAQ-100 index. And new documents, leaked by Edward Snowden and reported in The Guardian newspaper, show how the NSA got Microsoft to circumvent its own encryption.
byline: Sarah McCammon, Chester Wisniewski and Bruce Johnson
